text: The 2001 Volvo PGA Championship was the 47th edition of the Volvo PGA Championship, an annual professional golf tournament on the European Tour. It was held 25–28 May at the West Course of Wentworth Club in Virginia Water, Surrey, England, a suburb southwest of London. Andrew Oldcorn won by two strokes over Ángel Cabrera to claim his first Volvo PGA Championship. == Course layout == == Past champions in the field == Ten former champions entered the tournament. ===
